name: GRUB MUNCH
description:
The amount of different colors of roots you eat determines the stats you get for your next life. So eat as much as you can!

Simple game made for this year's Global Game Jam based on the theme "roots".

Programming/SFX/Unity stuff: Me

Art/Music: Alex S.

Font: Baby Doll https://www.dafont.com/babydoll.font
